destruction_type.description: Determines the effect of the explosion to the terrain.
destruction_type.markdownDescription: Determines the effect of the explosion to the terrain.

indestructible.description: If specified, the blocks that fulfill this condition will not be destroyed by the summoned explosion.
indestructible.markdownDescription: If specified, the blocks that fulfill this condition will not be destroyed by the summoned explosion.

destructible.description: If specified, only the blocks that fulfill this condition will be destroyed by the summoned explosion.
destructible.markdownDescription: If specified, only the blocks that fulfill this condition will be destroyed by the summoned explosion.

create_fire.description: Determines if the summoned explosion should create fire.

type.description:
## Explode --- [Block Action Type](https://origins.readthedocs.io/en/latest/types/block_action_types/explode) Summons an explosion with a specific explosion power. Type ID: `origins:explode` --- ### üìù Note See [Minecraft Wiki: Explosion (Explosion strength)](https://origins.readthedocs.io/en/latest/types/block_action_types/explode) for a list of power values that are used in vanilla. --- ### Examples ```json "block_action": { "type": "origins:explode", "power": 5, "destruction_type": "none", "create_fire": false } ``` This example will summon an explosion at the position of where the block action was invoked that would not destroy the terrain nor spread fire.
```json "block_action": { "type": "origins:explode", "power": 5, "destruction_type": "break", "destructible": { "type": "apoli:in_tag", "tag": "minecraft:impermeable" }, "create_fire": false } ``` This example will summon an explosion at the position of where the block action was invoked that would only destroy blocks that are in the `#minecraft:impermeable` (`data/minecraft/tags/blocks/impermeable.json`) block tag.
